column5: Have  not been on lately...Just wanted to see how everyone is doing....We are sooooo ready to go do some major fishing soon. My better half said today rainbow will be in season soon...YUM YUM! have never caught one of those either! Well husbands business has really blessed us, so good to see him have such good talents and a hard worker.... We just celebrated our 1st anniversary of blissful marriage, can't complain....  Hope to meet some of you this summer...Ah one of our customers is an OFC member too! Maybe one of these days I can get him on here...  Lorissa & OmegaMan
Welcome back Lorissa1 And congrats on your first year anniversary!!!!! It only gets better from here on!!
hello, im HeyBud, nice to meet ya and welcome back... p.s pay no attention to the thorold guy
I remember my first anniversary, something like 16 years ago... wishing you many great days ahead.  Look forward to your summer posts and pictures..  Cheers,  Jen
LORISSA!! Where have you been?? Glad to see you back here.
One year of Marriage = 1 year closer to being six feet under...  Gerritt   Ohhh yeah congrats

MARRIAGE?!?!?! I knew we forgot about something....my GF and I skipped that step and went strait to baby making! hehehe now we have a beautiful 6 month old daughter........Hmmmmmmmm new boat, or engagement ring?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!  Congrats, and good fishin'  UF
Thanx everyone... Get the boat and take her out on the lake and then give her the ring!  And of course a bottle of wine....you know the rest  Lorissa

Well 15 years ago I got engaged bought the house put the wedding money down  on the house ,I have 3 kids not married nothing is different she is still the boss and she let me buy the boat.  There are 3 rings if you get married.......  The engagement Ring.  The wedding Ring  And the Suffering  enough said. MTP
I guess I am blessed then, mine still likes me, sometimes like a slurping pup...I call him that sometimes.....I guess that is why it is called the honeymoon stage....  Lorissa
